text:
"Armando Calderón Sol" (June 24, 1948 – October 9, 2017) was a Salvadorian politician. He served as President of El Salvador from June 1, 1994 to June 1, 1999, representing the Nationalist Republican Alliance (ARENA).
Calderón Sol died on 9 October 2017 of lung cancer at a Houston, Texas hospital at the age of 69.
